params.label: Name given to treasury, use only as descriptor, not lookup

params.P: Pubkey of contributor (ρ * G, where ρ is contributor's privKey)
params.Q: ρ * treasuryPubKey, a val that can only be derived using          α * P (where α is the treasury's private key)

deposit((bytes32,bytes32),(bytes32,bytes.notice: Contribute to a treasury on the platform

@dev Should be stored in a Merkle Tree instead of an array
